html:
Nov 9 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O:

  • AMAZON AND WEBER FILE JOINT LAWSUIT AGAINST COUNTERFEITERS

  • AMAZON.COM INC - FILED A LAWSUIT AGAINST 12 DEFENDANTS FOR SELLING PRODUCTS THAT ILLEGALLY BEAR WEBER® REGISTERED TRADEMARK IN AMAZON'S STORE

  • AMAZON.COM INC - AMAZON CLOSED DEFENDANTS' SELLING ACCOUNTS AND PROACTIVELY REFUNDED IMPACTED CUSTOMERS

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
